name: Aliens Took Over My School!
description:
A hack n' slash game in which you will face lovecraftian aliens inside your school. Being fast and aggressive will be fundamental in order to survive the night and escape the school alive.

 Grab your bat and start smashing those nasty aliens!

Even though keyboard control is fully supported, this experience is intended to be played with a controller.

This game was made by:

  • Raúl Ángel Lago Castro - programming
  • Alfonso López Viejo - programming
  • Gonzalo Pintos Cuesta - programming
  • Daniel Sánchez Álvarez - art
  • Sofía García Álvarez - art
  • Me! - game and level design, VFX and sound

Special thanks to Vieitör (https://vieitor.bandcamp.com/) for letting us use their music in the game.
